name: Bang bang Towers
description:
You're a Government agent, tasked with transporting a new super secret experimental weapon to a super secret military base. Evil androids have attached your transport vehicle, forcing you to take cover.

Use the super secret experimental weapon to defend yourself, protect the prototype and survive until help arrives!!!

Dismantle the enemy Androids to collect scrap from their parts and use this to construct sentry turrets to fight alongside you.

Choose from a machine gun turret or a missile turret to mow down enemies and upgrade them to double the firepower!!!

Watch out! The androids have a few tricks of their own up their sleeves... With weapons of their own make sure you put your barricades to good use! Use scrap to also build barricades to defend yourself.

The Controls are fairly straight forward:

W, A, S, D are used for movement - W for forwards, A for left, D for right and S for down.

Click the left mouse button to shoot bullets where your looking, your character will look towards your mouse cursor.

Use the Buttons on the bottom right of the screen to place down and build your various turrets/defences. Make sure you have enough scrap though!

You can use the Q and E keys to rotate the turrets/defences first before placing them.
